section1.title: Connecting <0>Talent</0><1 />and <2>Opportunity</2><3 />Smarter than ever.
section1.subtitle: Skip the search - Connect with great job <0 />opportunities fast. Join now, it’s FREE.

section2.title: Get hired.<0 />Fast and smart.
section2.subtitle: Start getting job matches tailored to your unique profile - No more guessing. Start now, it’s free.
section2.card1: Land interviews sooner – Our AI connects you with the right job opportunities in days instead of weeks, so you can start moving forward faster.
section2.card2: You're matched with jobs you’ll actually thrive in – The AI looks beyond keywords, matching you to roles that fit your skills, experience, and even your work style.
section2.card3: Spend less time searching, more time choosing – With instant, accurate matches, you focus on the best opportunities instead of scrolling endlessly through job boards.

section3.title_desktop: <0>Our AI agent Polaris</0><1 />is working for you!
section3.card1_title: The process is smooth and supportive
section3.card1_text: From application to offer, our AI assists every step, helping you stand out and move forward without all the guesswork.
section3.card2_text: Our AI agent Polaris makes sure your profile is matched with the right opportunities instantly, so you’re not stuck waiting for weeks to hear back.

section4.headline: We Do The Heavy Lifting. <0 />You Focus on <1>Growing.</1>
section4.description: Your job hunt on auto-pilot - We match, apply and update you every step of the way while you focus on personal growth.

section5.title: <0>Premium Features</0>
section5.description: Unlock advanced tools and enjoy enhanced visibility, faster connections and more support with Magneto HR’s fully transferable premium features.

profile_booster.title: Profile Booster:
profile_booster.description: Profile Booster is your competitive edge in today's crowded job market. It pushes your profile to the top of recruiter searches, making sure you're seen first by companies actively looking for talent like you. <0>Learn more</0>

turbo_finder.title: Turbo Finder:
turbo_finder.description: Turbo Finder does the work, scanning thousands of job openings, matching you with curated roles that fit your skills and even applying for you. No more guesswork, no more spam jobs — just real, relevant openings. <0>Learn more</0>

section6.title: Access to millions of <0>Job Opportunities</0> in the US.
section6.description: Whether you’re in the US or Latin America, Magneto HR connects you to the right jobs in the right places. Access to 25+ million companies in the US looking for both remote and in-office talent just like you — all from a single dashboard.

section1.main_title: AI-driven job search with <0 />real results and no subscriptions

block1.title: Magneto HR gives job seekers real power—with no strings <0 />attached.
block1.description: Gain lifetime access to AI-driven tools that help you find better jobs, faster. From automated job matching to profile boosting, every feature is designed to give you a real advantage in today’s competitive market.

block2.title: No subscriptions. No lock-ins. Just full control over your career journey.
block2.description: Even Better? It’s not a rental. It’s yours to keep and fully transferable. Whether you’re actively searching or taking a break, your premium access stays flexible.

section1.highlight_subtitle: let AI find <0 />the right role for you.

turbo_finder.title: Turbo Finder
turbo_finder.subtitle: Your cutting-edge solution to better job opportunities.
turbo_finder.description1: Say goodbye to manual searches and scrolling through job boards. Powered by an advanced AI algorithm, Turbo Finder does the work, scanning thousands of job openings and matching you with curated roles that fit your skills. No more guesswork, no more spam jobs — just real, relevant openings.
turbo_finder.description2: Designed for maximum time efficiency, Turbo Finder and its auto apply feature help you to get hired in no time by applying to top positions for you — all while maintaining control over your choices.

curated_matches.title: Curated Matches
curated_matches.description: Get job opportunities tailored to your skills, goals, and experience.

time_saving.title: Time-Saving
time_saving.description: Skip the endless scrolling and reduce the time it takes to land interviews.

auto_apply.title: Auto-Apply
auto_apply.description: Automatically apply to top-matching roles so you never miss a chance.

smart_ai.title: Smart AI
smart_ai.description: Let powerful, cutting-edge tech do the heavy lifting and find roles that truly fit.

stand_out.title1: Here's what makes Turbo Finder stand out:
stand_out.description: Not job hunting right now? No problem. Sell it or pass it on. Turn your premium access into real value instead of letting it sit unused.

banner.description: Smarter. Sharper. More flexible job searching.

profile_booster.intro: Want to make your profile stand out?
profile_booster.title: Meet Profile Booster
profile_booster.subtitle: Your competitive edge in today's crowded job market.
profile_booster.description1: It pushes your profile to the top of recruiter searches, making sure you're seen first by companies actively looking for talent like you. Whether you're applying daily or just keeping an eye out for the right opportunity.
profile_booster.description2: No more sitting at the bottom of the pile. With boosted visibility and front-row placement, your profile stands out and draws attention from top recruiters.

flexibility.title1: And it's not just powerful, it's flexible.
flexibility.title2: Profile Booster is a Transferable Premium Feature.
flexibility.description: Meaning if you're not job hunting at the moment, you can sell it or pass it on. Don't let your visibility go to waste — turn it into real value or save it for when you're ready.

banner.description: Make sure the right people see you boost your visibility with Profile Booster.

one_year.title1: No time to look for a job?
one_year.intro: Get 12 months of smarter job searching with
one_year.subtitle: Turbo Finder + Profile Booster
one_year.subtitle2: the ultimate duo for landing the right job, faster.
one_year.description1: Let AI find and auto-apply to top-matching roles, while your profile gets boosted to the top of recruiter searches for maximum visibility.
one_year.description2: With this full-feature bundle, your job search is on autopilot for 12 full months — making it the right choice for any job seeker who wants to save time, get noticed faster, and land better opportunities with the power of AI and premium visibility working on their side.

features.unlimited_use: Unlimited use of Turbo Finder & Profile Booster
features.one_year_coverage: 1-year coverage for long-term job search power

best_part.title2: This is a Transferable Premium Feature.
best_part.description: meaning you can re-sell it or transfer it if you land your dream job early.

banner.description: One year of premium job-hunting power. No limits, just opportunities.

lifetime.title1: How does unlimited for life sound?
lifetime.intro: Unlock unlimited access for life with the ultimate job search toolkit
lifetime.subtitle: Combining the AI-powered precision of Turbo Finder with the unmatched visibility of Profile Booster.
lifetime.description1: With this full-feature package, you'll always be ready for your next big opportunity — whether it's tomorrow or five years from now.
lifetime.description2: From auto-applying to curated job matches on your behalf to getting priority placement in recruiter searches with no expiration — this becomes the ideal tool for every job seeker looking to have an edge and be on top of other candidates forever.

features.unlimited_features: Unlimited Turbo Finder + Profile Booster for life
features.no_fees: No monthly fees, no renewals, no subscription
features.time_saving: Unlimited time saving for the rest of your career
features.ongoing_insights: Ongoing performance insights to track your progress

good_news.description: And because it's lifetime access, there's no pressure — use it when you need it, and even transfer, share, or re-sell it if your job search slows down.

banner.description: Invest once. Stay visible. Get hired — on your terms, for life.
